body.p: The main reasons for Mr Schmid’s dissent are:

li.p: depreciation/amortisation of non‑current assets that are still in active use should not cease only because of a management decision to sell the assets that has not yet been fully carried out; and
measurement of assets should not be based on a management decision that has not yet been fully carried out, requiring a very rule‑based Standard.
